body:
Fixes #2836.  Fixes #2419.

I finally updated the MPI section in the Spack documentation by distilling this [google group post](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/spack/ECmt5-Ew3yo/Is0F2lLHCAAJ).

This includes many more details on how the compiler wrappers work and how they interact with MPI.

I think the packaging guide needs some reworking -- the top-level TOC is too long right now, and the topics aren't organized as clearly as they could be.  But I'll save a more extensive rework for later, as @alalazo has the pending documentation PR #2780.

@adamjstewart @citibeth @alalazo
title: Packaging docs for MPI
